div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
براه لعبد اللّه بن حنان جيّان جنان حيّان حبّان حيار حبّار من ثلثة عشر لبان لؤلؤ سليمن بن كلب عطيّة
العلوي وهي الــلّبان الّتي حمل بها جرير بن نمير لسليمن بن عطيّة
شهد شبّر شبّر بن ــم ومسلم بن أبي إيلة وعبد الرحمن بن أبي
إيلة وكيليه وكتب يوم السّبت سنة أربع ومائة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
barāʾaẗ:un li ʿabdi ăl lāhi bni ḥabbān:in ḥanāna ḥayyān:in ǧayyān:in ḥibbāna ǧinān:in ḥubbāna ḥabbār:in ḥiyār:in min ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara libāna luʾluʾa sulaymāna bni kalb:ini ʿaṭiyyaẗa
ăl ʿalawiyyi wa hiya ăl libānu ăllatī ḥamala bi hā ǧarīru bnu numayr:in li sulaymāna bni ʿaṭiyyaẗa
šahida šabbaru šabru šibru bnu ***m wa muslimu bnu ʾabī ʾīlaẗa wa ʿabdu ăl raḥmāni bnu ʾabī
ʾīlaẗa wakīlay hi wa kutiba yawma ăs sabti sanaẗa ʾarbaʿ:in wa miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God the merciful and compassionate.
... for the thirteen pearls of ... (This is) a quittance for ʿAbdallāh ibn Ḥanān for the thirteen milch-ewes of Sulaimān ibn Kalb (This is) a quittance for ʿAbdallah ibn Hanan for the 13 milch-ewes that were brought by Jarir ibn Numayr ibn Kalb
al-ʿAlawi - they are the milch-ewes that were brought by Jarir ibn Numayr for Sulayman ibn ʿAtiyyah. al-ʿAlawī, they being the [milch-ewes] which were brought by Jarīr ibn Numayr for Sulaymān ibn ʿAṭiyya. uns zwar sind sie die [...], für welche Ǧarīr b. Numayr bei Sulaimān b. ʿAṭīya gebürgt hatte
It was witnessed by Šabr ibn [ ] ... and Muslim ibn Abī ʾĪla and ʿAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Shabr ibn ..., Muslim ibn Abu Ila and ʿAbd al-Rahman ibn Abu
ʾĪla, hist two agents. It was written on Saturday in the year one hundred and four. Ila, his two agents, were witnesses, and it was writen on Saturday in the year 104.
